nodes.text: The 5x5 Puzzle Cube was a cube-shaped combination puzzle. It was notoriously more difficult than other similar games, like the Cerean Puzzle Cube, and posed a challenge to even the most technically-minded.
During the Imperial blockade of the Anoat sector, a young smuggler from Burnin Konn asked a member of their crew to solve a 5x5 Puzzle Cube.

The 5x5 Puzzle Cube was first mentioned in an optional Crew Run mission of the same name available in Star Wars: Uprising, a canon mobile game developed by Kabam, Disney Interactive, and Lucasfilm for iOS and Android platforms. The game was released on September 10, 2015.
